PV问题测试验证[代码](https://github.com/tuxchow/os_exercises/blob/master/code/lab7-2.py)

11. 在一间酒吧里有三个音乐爱好者队列，第一队的音乐爱好者只有随身听，第二队的只有音乐磁带，第三队只有电池。而要听音乐就必须随身听，音乐磁带和电池这三种物品俱全。酒吧老板依次出售这三种物品中的任意两种。当一名音乐爱好者得到这三种物品并听完一首乐曲后，酒吧老板才能再一次出售这三种物品中的任意两种。于是第二名音乐爱好者得到这三种物品，并开始听乐曲。全部买卖就这样进行下去。试用P，V操作正确解决这一买卖。

测试样例：

    1个生产者，3类消费者各三个

threads.append(Producer("Producer", semaphore0, semaphore1, semaphore2, semaphore3))
for i in range(0, 3):
    threads.append(Listener("Listener1-"+str(i), 1, semaphore0, semaphore1))
    threads.append(Listener("Listener2-"+str(i), 2, semaphore0, semaphore2))
    threads.append(Listener("Listener3-"+str(i), 3, semaphore0, semaphore3))

测试输出：

Producer is waiting for the semaphore of Producer
Listener1-0 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener1
Produce Walkman, Battery for Listener2
Listener2-0 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener2
Producer has realease the semaphore of Listener2
Listener2-0: Buy Walkman, Battery. Listening
Producer is waiting for the semaphore of Producer
Listener3-0 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener3
Listener1-1 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener1
Listener2-1 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener2
Listener3-1 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener3
Listener1-2 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener1
Listener2-2 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener2
Listener3-2 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener3
Listener2-0 has realease the semaphore of Producer
Produce Walkman, Tape for Listener3
Listener2-0 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener2
Producer has realease the semaphore of Listener3
Listener3-0: Buy Walkman, Tape. Listening
Producer is waiting for the semaphore of Producer
Listener3-0 has realease the semaphore of Producer
Produce Walkman, Tape for Listener3
Listener3-0 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener3
Producer has realease the semaphore of Listener3
Listener3-0: Buy Walkman, Tape. Listening
Producer is waiting for the semaphore of Producer
Listener3-0 has realease the semaphore of Producer
Produce Walkman, Battery for Listener2
Listener3-0 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener3
Producer has realease the semaphore of Listener2
Listener2-1: Buy Walkman, Battery. Listening
Producer is waiting for the semaphore of Producer
Listener2-1 has realease the semaphore of Producer
Produce Walkman, Battery for Listener2
Listener2-1 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener2
Producer has realease the semaphore of Listener2
Producer is waiting for the semaphore of Producer
Listener2-2: Buy Walkman, Battery. Listening
Produce Walkman, Tape for Listener3
Listener2-2 has realease the semaphore of Producer
Listener2-2 is waiting for the semaphore of Listener2
Producer has realease the semaphore of Listener3
Listener3-2: Buy Walkman, Tape. Listening
Producer is waiting for the semaphore of Producer

结论：

通过以上输出结果可看出，生产者在每次生产之前会发出请求，如有则获得semaphore并生产，之后释放对应类消费者的锁，在消费者完成消费后，会释放生产者的锁。而每类消费者都在等待其对应的消费者类锁，在消费者释放后可以获取。其过程满足了同步互斥的要求，符合题意。

spoc1 磁盘访问联系
扇区访问序列：10,11,12,13,24,1


# SSTF
# sector 10 seek 0   rotate 105 transer 30
# sector 11 seek 0   rotate 0     transer 30
# sector 1  seek 0    rotate 60   transer 30
# sector 12 seek 40 rotate 290 transer 30
# sector 13 seek 0   rotate 0     transer 30
# sector 24 seek 40 rotate 260 transer 30
# total                 80            715             150

(1) 按照我们小组的考虑，SCAN和C-SCAN算法在访问完sector 11后会跳下另一磁道访问sector 12，而不是访问sector 1，这是因为sector 11是外道的最后一个sector。当然，造成这种原因主要怪磁头初始位置并没有在sector 0前面......如果访问序列是10,11,12,13,24,7。那么这个sector 7在第一遍scan的时候会被读到访问


2) 其次关于第二道里为什么会读sector 12和13，按(1)中的说法，转一圈回过来再访问sector 12、13貌似与(1)的说法矛盾。因为磁头读完11跳到第2道这段时间内磁盘仍在转，寻道完成后已经是sector 13的1/3处，因而无法完整访问sector12 和 13。但是这是演示程序与测试用例本身的原因导致的。         实际情况中，访问磁盘并不以扇区为基本单位。同时对于连续数据的访问，如果跨越了不同磁道，并且下一磁道的不留空白数据段作缓冲的话，磁头是不能高效、充分地访问数据的，就会出现转一圈再回来读写的情况。在本例中说的就是sector 12、13。按照本例来说，sector 12以及sector13的前1/3部分，都应该作为空白区间，这样磁头在从最外道换到第2道时，磁头就能直接开始访问连续数据了，而不需要等磁盘转一圈再开始。这是一种用较小空间换取较多时间的方法。

当然，第(2)问的说法和本题无关。

#SCAN
# sector 10 seek 0    rotate 105  transer 30
# sector 11 seek 0    rotate 0      transer 30
# sector 12 seek 40  rotate 320  transer 30
# sector 13 seek 0    rotate 0      transer 30
# sector 24 seek 40  rotate 260  transer 30
# sector 1   seek 80  rotate 280  transer 30
# total                 160           965              150

#C-SCAN
# sector 10 seek 0    rotate 105  transer 30
# sector 11 seek 0    rotate 0      transer 30
# sector 12 seek 40  rotate 320  transer 30
# sector 13 seek 0    rotate 0      transer 30
# sector 24 seek 40  rotate 260  transer 30
# sector 1  seek 40   rotate 320  transer 30
# total                120            1005            150

```
22 writer writing
22 writer done

23 reader done
```
> 总体说明这是公平的，正确且没有同步问题
